groups.title: The "TION" Rule
groups.description: Rule: English words ending in ...tion generally become Spanish ...ción.

groups.title: The "ATE" Rule
groups.description: Rule: English words ending in ...ate generally become Spanish infinitives ending ...ar.

groups.title: The "IZE" Rule
groups.description: Rule: English words ending in ...ize generally become Spanish ...izar.

groups.title: The "AL" Rule
groups.description: Rule: English words ending in ...al often keep ...al in Spanish (with some spelling quirks).

groups.title: The "IC" Rule
groups.description: Rule: English words ending in ...ic usually become Spanish ...ico.

groups.title: The "ITY" Rule
groups.description: Rule: English words ending in ...ity often become Spanish ...idad.

groups.title: The "ISM / YSM" Rule
groups.description: Rule: English words ending in ...ism or ...ysm usually become Spanish ...ismo.

groups.title: The "SION" Rule
groups.description: Rule: English words ending in ...sion generally become Spanish ...sión.

groups.title: The "OUS" Rule
groups.description: Rule: English words ending in ...ous often become Spanish ...oso.

groups.title: The "ENT" Rule
groups.description: Rule: English words ending in ...ent (except ...ment) often become Spanish ...ente.

groups.title: The "ALLY" Rule
groups.description: Rule: English words ending in ...ally generally become Spanish ...mente (and ...cally -> ...camente).

groups.title: The "ARY / ORY" Rule
groups.description: Rule: English ...ary -> Spanish ...ario and English ...ory -> Spanish ...orio.

groups.title: The "BLE" Rule
groups.description: Rule: English words ending in ...ble are often the same in Spanish (with common spelling quirks).

groups.title: The "IVE" Rule
groups.description: Rule: English words ending in ...ive usually become Spanish ...ivo.
